title: Now that WKXB Jammin 99.9 FM is broadcasting in HD, what does Sunrise Broadcasting plan to offer on their HD2 and HD3 channels?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/07/does-cumulus-broadcasting-or-capital-broadcasting-sunrise-plan-to-convert-any-of-their-locally-owned-fm-radio-stations-to-an-hd-format/
